event.description: Fred Lewis strikes out swinging.
Edgar Renteria flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Randy Winn flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Bengie Molina flies out to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Aaron Rowand flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Rich Aurilia strikes out swinging.
Juan Uribe grounds out, first baseman James Loney to pitcher Eric Stults.
Emmanuel Burriss pops out to first baseman James Loney.
Jonathan Sanchez pops out to shortstop Juan Castro.
Fred Lewis flies out to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Edgar Renteria lines out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Randy Winn grounds out, shortstop Juan Castro to first baseman James Loney.
Bengie Molina flies out to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Aaron Rowand doubles (6) on a fly ball to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Rich Aurilia flies out to right fielder Andre Ethier. Aaron Rowand to 3rd.
Juan Uribe grounds out, pitcher Eric Stults to first baseman James Loney.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a ground ball to shortstop Juan Castro.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eugenio Velez replaces Jonathan Sanchez.
Eugenio Velez pops out to first baseman James Loney.
Fred Lewis flies out to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Edgar Renteria reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Orlando Hudson, assist to third baseman Casey Blake. Emmanuel Burriss to 3rd. Edgar Renteria to 2nd.
Randy Winn flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Bengie Molina strikes out swinging.
Aaron Rowand called out on strikes.
Rich Aurilia flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Juan Uribe pops out to second baseman Orlando Hudson.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a line drive to right fielder Andre Ethier.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Nate Schierholtz replaces Justin Miller.
Nate Schierholtz strikes out swinging.
Fred Lewis grounds out to first baseman James Loney.
Defensive Substitution: Xavier Paul replaces right fielder Andre Ethier, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Edgar Renteria doubles (5) on a ground ball to left fielder Juan Pierre.
Randy Winn flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Bengie Molina flies out to center fielder Matt Kemp.
Aaron Rowand grounds out, third baseman Casey Blake to first baseman James Loney.
Juan Pierre doubles (2) on a ground ball to third baseman Juan Uribe, deflected by pitcher Jonathan Sanchez.
Orlando Hudson singles on a ground ball to left fielder Fred Lewis. Juan Pierre to 3rd.
Andre Ethier grounds into a double play, shortstop Edgar Renteria to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Rich Aurilia. Juan Pierre scores. Orlando Hudson out at 2nd.
Matt Kemp flies out to right fielder Randy Winn.
Russell Martin walks.
James Loney grounds into a force out, third baseman Juan Uribe to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. Russell Martin out at 2nd. James Loney to 1st.
Casey Blake walks. James Loney to 2nd.
Juan Castro doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Aaron Rowand. James Loney scores. Casey Blake to 3rd.
Eric Stults grounds out to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Juan Pierre doubles (3) on a line drive to center fielder Aaron Rowand. Casey Blake scores. Juan Castro scores. Juan Pierre advances to 3rd, on a fielding error by center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Orlando Hudson grounds out, second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Andre Ethier strikes out swinging.
Matt Kemp grounds out, third baseman Juan Uribe to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Russell Martin walks.
With James Loney batting, Russell Martin steals (3) 2nd base.
James Loney called out on strikes.
Casey Blake flies out to right fielder Randy Winn.
Juan Castro flies out to left fielder Fred Lewis.
Eric Stults called out on strikes.
Juan Pierre flies out to left fielder Fred Lewis.
Orlando Hudson doubles (11) on a fly ball to right fielder Randy Winn.
Andre Ethier strikes out swinging.
Matt Kemp singles on a ground ball to left fielder Fred Lewis. Orlando Hudson scores.
With Russell Martin batting, Matt Kemp steals (8) 2nd base.
Jonathan Sanchez intentionally walks Russell Martin.
James Loney pops out to third baseman Juan Uribe in foul territory.
Pitching Change: Justin Miller replaces Jonathan Sanchez, batting 9th, replacing Eugenio Velez.
Casey Blake called out on strikes.
Juan Castro singles on a line drive to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Eric Stults out on a sacrifice bunt, catcher Bengie Molina to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. Juan Castro to 2nd.
Juan Pierre flies out to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Orlando Hudson grounds out, third baseman Juan Uribe to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Andre Ethier grounds out, second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Matt Kemp grounds out, catcher Bengie Molina to first baseman Rich Aurilia.
Pitching Change: Osiris Matos replaces Justin Miller, batting 1st, replacing left fielder Fred Lewis.
Defensive switch from right field to left field for Randy Winn.
Nate Schierholtz remains in the game as the right fielder.
Russell Martin singles on a fly ball to right fielder Nate Schierholtz.
James Loney pops out to third baseman Juan Uribe in foul territory.
Casey Blake reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Juan Uribe. Russell Martin to 2nd.
Juan Castro doubles (2) on a line drive to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Russell Martin scores. Casey Blake to 3rd.
Eric Stults singles on a line drive to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Casey Blake scores. Juan Castro to 3rd.
Juan Pierre singles on a line drive to left fielder Randy Winn. Juan Castro scores. Eric Stults to 2nd.
Orlando Hudson grounds into a force out, first baseman Rich Aurilia to shortstop Edgar Renteria. Eric Stults to 3rd. Juan Pierre out at 2nd. Orlando Hudson to 1st.
Andre Ethier flies out to left fielder Randy Winn.
